import React from 'react' import Header from '../Header/Header' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import "./ViewCart.css" export default function ViewCart(props) { const { cartItems, totalAmount, isModalOpen, removeFromCart, handleAddToCart, toggleCartModal, openModal, closeModal, handleIncrease, handleDecrease } = props return (

Your Cart

Home / Your Cart

Please, hurry! Someone has placed an order on one of the items you have in the cart. Products are limited, checkout within 50:12 s

{cartItems.map((item, index) => (
))}
PRODUCT
QUANTITY
SUBTOTAL:
{item.title}

{(item.quantity || 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}
£ {(item.price * (item.quantity || 1)).toFixed(2)}

Do you want a gift wrap?

£ Only 2.00

right-side div
) }
